{x y z : ℤ} : pythagorean_triple x y z ↔ ∃ (k m n : ℤ), (x = k * (m ^ 2 - n ^ 2) ∧ y = k * (2 * m * n) ∨ x = k * (2 * m * n) ∧ y = k * (m ^ 2 - n ^ 2)) ∧ (z = k * (m ^ 2 + n ^ 2) ∨ z = -k * (m ^ 2 + n ^ 2))
